editorialNotes.tagline: Get a real-life view of products
See the paintings in your home
editorialNotes.standard: If you don’t have a private jet to fly you around the world in search of priceless paintings, Artsy is the next best thing. This sleek, minimalist app pulls together thousands of works of art, letting you browse a self-curated collection in the palm of your hand. Follow your favourite artists, discover intriguing new talents, explore museum exhibits or even inquire about purchasing one-of-a-kind pieces from galleries worldwide.
editorialNotes.short: Discover and buy fine art from around the world.
